label: 市川団十郎
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: いちかわだんじゅうろう
見出し読み_mod: いちかわだんじゅうろう
説明文: (1660-1704)[One of the first great actors of kabuki.][He] developed the aragoto (rough business) style to enact the great feats of strenght of rash heroes.  His bravado suited the impetuous temperament of the Edo plebs in the pit (p. 753). [歌舞伎、荒事]
